lenders.name: Olga
lenders.loan_because: A chance for someone else is a gift to me!

lenders.name: Stephen

lenders.name: Nelleke and Henk

lenders.occupational_info: Married, 3 kids.  Any day above ground is a great day!

lenders.name: Preston

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a church and help people grow in their relationship with Jesus.  In turn, they reach out in love to the world around them.

lenders.name: Ingrid
lenders.loan_because: A Mother wants to take care of all the children.

lenders.name: Truus and Bernhard
lenders.loan_because: We have to much in this part of the world!

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I want  to help people out and make sure they have a happy life. <3

lenders.name: Deborah & Scott
lenders.loan_because: We believe in sharing and giving to our friends and the world.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed in life.  Always having what I and my family needed, so I wanted to give those in need a chance for a better life for themselves and their families.  I seen a talk show where Bill Clinton talked about this great program.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a very similar job, I also bake bread, rolls,pies just like her.

lenders.name: Lola
lenders.loan_because: it only takes one person to change the world and my mom said to start young.

lenders.name: Angeline
lenders.loan_because: I've experienced first hand how a little bit of help can go a long way.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: cooking, cleaning, walking the dog, paying bills.

lenders.name: Jason Kendall
lenders.loan_because:
As a UNIX admin who supports global foreign currency exchange trading, I am part of the Evil Global Empire.  So, I figure I have to mitigate part of my time in the seventh circle with an occasional good deed.  However, we all know how such spiritual payola goes, so I guess it is just a generally good thing to do.  And now that it CAN be done with ease, why not support it?  I mean, for $50, I could take out my wife to eat at a relatively good Manhattan restaurant, or do this.  All works to be the same I guess.  The money I would spend at the restaurant helps the Mexican immigrants who do the dishes to send remittances back to Chiapas or wherever.  But this just seems a little more direct.  In all, it is an interesting way to be a filla... philo... philly...  good-deed-doer.

Second, I used to work on the 104th Floor of the World Trade Center, and was a few minutes late that day.  The picture on this page was from my desk in that office.  What the developing world needs is responsible financial support to give hope to people and counteract the destructive influence of hyper-radical Islam.  Funding a farmer, cobbler, tailor, or cook helps make a real life for real people.      

They are just asking for a shot at dignity and independence.

Give them a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers all day long.  I help with global finance by making those computing systems work better.

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because: I still believe its better 2 give then 2 receive.
lenders.occupational_info: Paint, draw and be good to your surroundings.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I empower individuals to choose and decide based on their heart and soul.

lenders.name: Fabiano
lenders.loan_because:
---- Google translation ----
Because it is gratifying to know that the little that donated can help in any way another person.
lenders.occupational_info:
---- Google translation ----
I graduated in Graphic Design and job creating home for 3 years and edit videos 2 years ago. I noticed that the web pages that meet missing in one place tourist information on regions of my country, mainly in video (also tv). Then created a Web page where each company will have its own page with the right to 5 sections: videos, gallery, text information, comments and contact form. For that I am available 1 videographer, 1 journalist and 1 graphic design. Lack only equipment for filming (camera).

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone else to live a better life in a productive way. They can be proud of themselves and stand on their own two feet gaining personal pride and independence as well as professional pride.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people restyle and prepare their homes or businesses for resale. The housing market in the Netherlands is becoming more dynamic so the American-born industry of "home staging" or "verkoopstyling" has come to the Netherlands.

lenders.name: andresmh
lenders.occupational_info: play with computers

lenders.name: MaryAnn
lenders.loan_because: It gives me the chance to give to others who deserve a shot at independance, its what I had to struggle for as an single parent.
lenders.occupational_info: I create a memory for all occasions .

lenders.name: Mehgan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Tim & Bernd
lenders.loan_because: As a couple, we immigrated to Canada from the U.S., so we're sensitive to how difficult it can be to make a new start in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Bernd believes in recycling existing objects and transforming them into new works of beauty. In some ways, that's what each of us does with our lives as we embark on a new beginning. Tim is always thinking of new ways to be of service to others.

lenders.name: mariette
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance! Kiva has given me a way to touch others &it makes me feel that I can help other people believe  in themselves.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I have my own business which has taken many years to build up & on occasion I have received loans from very kind family members . I would like to help people who have no-one else to help them.
lenders.occupational_info:
Retail/Wholesale of Zulu Beadwork.
I buy bead work from many rural women .

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: It is good to help people.  My aunt gave me a gift certificate for Christmas and my mom and I used it to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going into 3rd grade

lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate.  These people are not.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an energy healer.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: the bothers and sisters need.

lenders.name: Tracy & Matthew
lenders.loan_because: we want to help.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy way to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Philosophy at a University.  I work for a non-profit organization that conducts environmental education, advocacy programs and celebrations while protecting the Hudson River, and I'm a small businessman.

lenders.name: sandra
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Devon
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate to be where I'm at. I want others in the world to have good fortune as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I sleep, I eat, I play. That's about it.

lenders.occupational_info: gsm technician repairer

lenders.loan_because: I care about the people in the world

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I pass on knowledge that was passed on to me.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because:
Mama told me when I was young Come sit beside me, my only son And listen closely to what I say. And if you do this It will help you some sunny day. Take your time... dont live too fast, Troubles will come and they will pass.  Forget your lust for the rich mans gold All that you need is in your soul, And you can do this if you try. And be a simple kind of man.
Be something you love and understand.
lenders.occupational_info: I've been working in a medically oriented field for almost ten years now, from service to direct care of sick and injured patients and their families.  I truely enjoy the work that I do and the things I can accomplish when I'm at work.

lenders.name: Arjen
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people in need helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: On a daily basis I work on improving business processes by finding (creative) solutions for  improving these processes and applying IT where the benefits outweigh the costs of the required investment.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I consider myself lucky to have been given the chances that I have.   If I can help others in the same fashion I've been helped I feel that it would be wrong not too.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Nerdyapplebottom
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should and I love to.

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: I want my kids to know it isn't all about us. There are people in this world that have nothing and we need to give to them. Giving is Receiving!
lenders.occupational_info:
I do a little of everything. 
I take care of my family. 
I homeschool and chauffer my kids to all their activites.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: True satisfaction comes from doing something for someone who can never repay you.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I have been an entrepreneur for many years and I am deeply inspired by Kiva.org's amazingly brilliant contribution to this world. Thank you for making it so easy for us to follow in your footsteps!
lenders.occupational_info: I ask questions that help people get very clear about their passions and their strengths; then I help them connect with people who share their vision so they can manifest their dreams TOGETHER (and never feel alone again!)

lenders.name: Emma Willard
lenders.loan_because: We are a Fair Trade organization that that wants to put the profits from our sales to good use.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell Fair Trade goods and educate our community about the benefits of Fair Trade

lenders.name: michelle
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I are small business owners and we can relate to the daily struggles one can endure and small business are the backbone of society!

lenders.name: Ryoshi
lenders.loan_because: i don't really need loans, i need people to help me out
lenders.occupational_info: in progress

lenders.name: Ashtin Vanderbilt
lenders.loan_because: I greatly appreciate that KIVA was established to truly help those in financial need that have no other viable means to survive or get ahead in life. Everyone deserves an opportunity to get ahead in life if they are willing to do the work. Especially those who have significantly fewer resources and opportunities available to them. There is nothing more rewarding in life than "Paying It Forward"!
lenders.occupational_info: “Being philanthropic does not require fortune and fame; it requires humility and compassion to help others.” -Ashtin Vanderbilt-©2009

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Kammy asked me to!  And gave me a credit for my first loan.  I can't wait to see how this works out!  Hi to Zenobia in Bolivia!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I live in Florida.  I am married and have three children.  I work writing proposals for governments and NGOs.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I believe that empowering others to be self reliant helps them to be productive and happy.  By extension, self reliant people makes the global community a better place for all.
lenders.occupational_info: I help teachers in American schools teach students about financial literacy and social change.

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: I would like to be a little bit of light in a dark world.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: It is our responsibility in this world to help others - we are our brother's keeper.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of a loan versus a handout/donation.  A handout helps someone for only a moment; by loaning someone money, they are able to improve themselves and their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to support the investment of insurance premiums so that future claims may be funded.

lenders.name: Toosje
lenders.loan_because: We can make the difference !

lenders.name: J Patrick Ritchie
lenders.loan_because: People everywhere are family to me.

lenders.name: Scott & Joellen
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Chris and Annie
lenders.loan_because: I have worked in many locations around the world and seen first hand how many hard working people can benefit from a small loan. It is amazing how much a little bit can help in these places.
lenders.occupational_info:
Police dog trainer/handler
Police Secretary

lenders.name: PJS
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much and I don't earn much but I'd like to think that the little help that I give out makes a big difference.  That's why since  I have more time than money, I also try to participate in http://freerice.com
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a flight attendant who works in the plane for customer service on board as well as making sure of the safety of our passengers.  I have seen both beautiful and sad places in my line of work which inspired me to try to help out as much as I can with the preservation of culturally rich but economically deprived countries.

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupational_info: I want to be a doctor.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people. I care about people in other places and I like to learn about people who live around the world. I put my savings in Kiva instead of the bank so it can be used better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in second grade. I like soccer and basketball. I want to be an engineer and build cars and planes.

lenders.name: Smith Family
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to be successful.  Kiva is the best way for us to help people all over the world to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people build well-designed, efficient and enjoyable communities.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: People are created in the image of God.  When you see people in that image, the sufferings of poverty are no longer tolerable.

lenders.name: Nora
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the "good" in people;
I am a Christisn, trying to make the world a better place, one person at a time-for my Grandchildren's world.
lenders.occupational_info: I assisted U.S. citizens to have a better life.......

lenders.name: Jessie
lenders.loan_because: Because I can.And especially to those who need a little support,only an opportunity to change their lives so they can lead a more secure,dignified and self-reliant life.Being involved in finance, I understand how the rich have easy access to capital,but the odds are stacked against poorer people who truly need loans to improve their circumstances.Plus I respect those who are looking for a small break and not asking for a handout.Kiva's micro-finance concept helps us all to contribute in transforming some lives, which in turn helps build better and happier communities,therefore leading to a more desirable world.Because of the personal aspect ,I am also able to empower women who face greater social and economic challenges.
lenders.occupational_info: I mentor and guide people to achieve their goals of financial security via acquisitions of income producing property. So I understand the importance of helping people get loans to improve their lives.Kiva  provides a micro-financing platform to help make a difference in those people's lives who need a loan the most, and yet have the hardest time getting it.

lenders.name: Miguel Fernando
lenders.loan_because: Aportar al desarrollo del pais, mediante las expresiones artisticas. propiciando de esta manera visiones de un futuro mejor para los necesitados
lenders.occupational_info: dibujos, talleres, conferencias, seminarios, que permitan la participacion de jovenes

lenders.name: Eliana
lenders.loan_because:
I care, it feels good to help others and I have been blessed with everything I have in my life. 

I was given some money to make 4 (my favorite number) loans as a gift from my better half, Marc, for Valentine's Day. We both would like to help people in need instead of buying each other useless Valentine gifts. ;O)

lenders.name: winpuppy
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Burns!
lenders.loan_because:
I like the (almost) direct contact of choosing a specific entrepreneur , and the ability to follow-up to see exactly where the money goes and how it helps.

I'm not just donating money to some giant faceless charity that may use the funds to help someone, or maybe to purchase more ads to generate more donations, or maybe to pay some overpaid CEO.  The money that I loan goes directly to an actual person and makes specific impact.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to help entrepreneurs in developing nations, particularly women, support their families and a more sustainable livelihood. I have plenty to share. This is a sustainable program, not just a donation, and I like the person-to-person contact made possible by the internet.
lenders.occupational_info: I convene conferences and retreats for entrepreneurs in the sustainability change movement to help them collaborate and spend their time and money effectively. I also design and deliver leadership capacity building programs. If someone wants to get better at any aspect of leadership, such as team building, working collaboratively, and developing a vision and getting others on board, I can help them do that.

lenders.name: Vicki Snyder
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women should help other women become independent so that they can take care of themselves.  It's also my way of sending love to women all over the world from America.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a buyer for a large corporation.  Now I travel, garden, and look for ways to help women in other parts of the world to promote love, peace independence and respect

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: 1) kiva is a non-profit; 2) it helps other people improve their standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites. And it's fun :)

lenders.name: Anonymous
lenders.loan_because: We have been self employed most of our lives. We respect people who believe in themselves enough to be entrepeneurs and we want to help them succeed.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: My son got me started by setting this up as a birthday gift.  I think it is a wonderful way to help those that really need it to get started or build their business.  It is great that I can make it a perpetual gift.

lenders.name: Rachel & Steve
lenders.loan_because: We want to help someone else be able to live the life they want and provide for their families. We all deserve to be able to live well and care for our families especially those willing and able to work.
lenders.occupational_info: We love to read, create items for friends and family, and we love volunteering in our community. We travel a bit as a  family , and we like to camp and hike. We're  on a mission to live the best lives we can.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: it's my duty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Tennessee in Knoxville, TN, and I am currently studying to be a civil engineer.

lenders.name: Fern
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my grand-daughter how important it is to help others.  And I also want to make the world she grows up in, a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a new grandmother. My granddaughter has so much and I want to teach her that it is important to help others.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: access to finance shouldn't just be for the rich but for anyone who wants to work hard and make their business a sucess.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on sustainable development public policy and advocacy.

lenders.name: Chie
lenders.loan_because: It's great if someone benefits from my small amount of money.
lenders.occupational_info: translator

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: knowing that I'm helping people around the world  - even just a little bit - makes be feel that I can make a difference in this big world.  Seeing them smile makes me smile.
lenders.occupational_info: I put down in words what other people feel and think about.  Sometimes it's poetry, sometimes its greeting cards, sometimes it's just words.

lenders.name: Weiss-Li
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a beautiful thing to help people with good ideas and intentions, yet cannot acheive those dreams due to small financial roadblocks.  I want to help and know that one day because people like me, they can see their planted seeds blossom into a forest of oppurtunity one day.  Everyone should have an equal chance to do, built & believe in their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Restaurant Owner & State commissioner.

lenders.name: elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: just because.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the mail room of a jesuit university in denver colorado.

lenders.name: Eric & Wendy
lenders.loan_because: these people can invest our money better than we ever could.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.occupation: Program Specialist for Student Involvement at PLU

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: I have been a proponent of micro enterprise lending since the early days of Muhammed Yunus and the Grameen Bank. I believe that lending empowers poor people to be able to educate their children, to have access to better housing, food, safe water, etc
lenders.occupational_info: I sell homes in Virginia, right outside of Washington DC.  I am also a yoga teacher and yoga therapist.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: it's an awesome opportunity to make loans around the world where a small amount of money can make a big difference for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct group dance exercise classes to help women stay fit and healthy

lenders.name: Marques Family
lenders.loan_because: it matters and it has an impact.  We believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and understand the need for support.
lenders.occupational_info: We live in Los Angeles and have two sons - Diego 3 and Matteo 7 months - Felippe is a commercial real estate broker and Gabriella is a film producer.

lenders.name: Sophia
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to make the world a better place for us all.

lenders.name: amy
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky to be in a position where I am able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach ten/eleven year old students with learning disabilities.

lenders.name: Connie & Jim
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who help themselves...who are taking charge of their lives and changing it for the better...I admire their courage!
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired now but we owned our own furniture business for over 20 years.

lenders.name: AHG
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: Moeen
lenders.loan_because:
What we earn, seems like it only belongs to us. I believe, the lord in-trusted us with everything we have so we can share it with those who have less. 
Having said that, it is not like I give a lot but I feel like, I NEED to.
lenders.occupational_info: I am  in Information Technology field.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the blessings I have received with women around the world who want to care for their families.  I am a follower of Jesus Christ and He taught often about compassion and generosity to the poor.  I know that most people prefer independence over charity, so if I can help a family start a business through Kiva, they can succeed and help others as well.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: My 8 year old son did the research for which person he wanted to give our loan to.  We earned the money by recycling bottles and cans.  We believe that we can make a difference in the world by helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a licensed midwife (deliver babies) and a licensed cosmetologist (hairstylist) by trade but I have been a stay at home Mom since the birth of my children.

lenders.name: Linda & Roger
lenders.loan_because: Jesus told us to reach out to others and give and we have decided to do just that.  We feel we are so blessed in this country and we are to serve others - KIVA is one way we can reach out and help to equip people to live productive lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired and stay busy around our 5 acres in the woods.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I have given to the MSSRF Foundation in India for many years. This is another fine way to help bring prosperity to many around the world. These loans are really in the name of my very young daughter Sally and my sister Kerry!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a patent firm dealing with associates and clients all over the world

lenders.name: Quin
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people
lenders.occupational_info: i'm superman, don't ask

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a carpenter and also design and build websites.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I believe business is a powerful vehicle for creating lasting social impact.

lenders.name: kevin
lenders.loan_because: buying my way into heaven

lenders.name: Vermillion
lenders.loan_because:
I basically want a world where people can dream. Dreams push people to set goals, goals push them to take action, action leads to success and success leads to bigger dreams. I loan because it helps this process. 

DO NOT CONTACT ASKING TO JOIN GROUPS!! I'm not at all fond of social networking phenom.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: Giving is the heart of Jesus Christ
lenders.occupational_info: Giving brings HOPE to the hopeless

lenders.name: Kacy
lenders.loan_because: Because I have been blessed enough to find myself in a position to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to understand how and why people make the economic decisions that they do, and then try to teach others how to do it better.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels to be in need of help, and also the feeling of when someone is there for you.  Now I want to give someone else that feeling.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the privelage of working for my dad who does drywall and also owns the buisness, I also work at the local ski resort as a snowboard instructor.  Then I own a small sheep buisness.  I have 9 ewes all with 2 possible lambs on the way. I then have them prosessed and am able to provide custom cut meat to my customers.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I truly care about other people than myself and want to help all humans live equally.
lenders.occupational_info: I learn so that one day i can work to help change the world for the better.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people achieve their dreams for a better life!
lenders.occupational_info: I take people out on horse back rides in the mountains and take care of horses!

lenders.name: clyde
lenders.loan_because: Giving is like getting a hug.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer repair

lenders.name: Matthias
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do . . . politically, economically, and spiritually.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm slave to capitalism  . . . it is what it is.

lenders.name: Itziar
lenders.loan_because: I've heard several radio programs about  micro-loans and their success in improving communities and relieving poverty. This is a great way of giving an opportunity to individuals around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the Cosmos, and train a new generation of young scientists.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.  Assisting others to achieve their dreams is just one small way I can help make the world a better place.  I Love Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I assist families in the purchase and or sale of their home(s).

lenders.name: Rob and Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: we all need to work together to make the whole world a better place
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a town trying to balance development growth, the laws, and the character of the community. My wife teaches teachers how to be better; helping children read and learn.

lenders.name: Vay
lenders.loan_because: I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep track of monies.

lenders.name: Rafael
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the IT infrastructure - servers, network, and computers - for a small manufacturing company located in Canada.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I have been given opportunities in my life to do good things, and I want to give other people the same opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people build better software.

lenders.name: Philip and Diane
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others that may be less fortunate, but have a dream and a desire to succeed.

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle each day.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy helping others.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: God has asked us to help those in need

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: i'm interested in other cultures
lenders.occupational_info: i play music for money

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: Everyone on the planet deserves an opportunity to put their talents and hard-work to good purpose.  Too much money gets frittered away on lattes and can go to better use by those who can make it grow and sustain entire families.
lenders.occupational_info: My work deals with helping communities make good decisions about land uses: often for development or renewal and sometimes with luck for land protection.

lenders.name: KFC
lenders.loan_because: We are called to love and care for our neighbors.

lenders.name: Bob, Rita & Dylan
lenders.loan_because: It's time we help those less fortunate. We all need help at some point in our lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a fireman, developer and builder who appreciates hard work. We were raised that your word still means something.

lenders.name: Joanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of the change I want to see in the world.

Yet, very few budding entrepreneurs in the developing world have access to the cash needed to get started or grow their businesses. I believe providing loans gives people the ability to support themselves and in doing so they support others and build community.
lenders.occupational_info: We make underwear, swim and loungewear in the US and across Asia. We try to use small, disadvantaged businesses whenever we can.

lenders.name: cordell
lenders.loan_because: i just want to help a little

lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed and would like to help, even if it is small amounts at a time.

lenders.occupational_info: We organise and run an association of retired senior citizens in local area to activiate senior people. We have several fields of activity. One of them is international relation promoting that I am responsible for.

lenders.name: Loren
lenders.loan_because: As a Baha'i, (http://www.bahai.us) I am firmly to committed to helping out those who are less fortunate. Loaning with Kiva is a way for me to pool my limited resources with the resources of others to make a big difference in the lives of those who are struggling to get ahead in life. It is one small way for me to collaborate with others who want to eliminate extreme poverty, and bring the world together. Everyone can do something to make a difference! The more we work together in unity, the bigger the change we can affect, and the better conditions will become for all members of our human family.
lenders.occupational_info: Presently, I am teaching English to non-native speakers, on the island of Sakhalin, in the Russian Far-East. I am passionate about my work because it empowers my students to take advantage of global economic opportunities that might otherwise be denied them.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.occupational_info: I am finishing my last year of law school.

lenders.name: Familie Keplinger
lenders.loan_because: me and my wife want to teach our 2 sons that a little help can change a lot

lenders.name: Busari
lenders.occupational_info: i repair electronic engines and i rent out musical instrument like speakers and engine.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping someone to help themselves is the best way of helping.

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because:
I like being able to see a connection with the people I loan money to.  Living in Wellington, I am blessed with a good job and many opportunities.  It is a privilege to be able to loan any amount of money or time and I am happy to have the chance to do so.

Entrepreneurship creates jobs and is the best development tool for any economy.  Even in Japan, the government is turning to entrepreneurship.

Ultimately I think that Kiva could really unleash a lot more power by allowing people in developing countries to loan small amounts to other people in other developing or developed countries.  I think that this would really empower people by breaking the concept that they are not successful and need to get loans.  

Entrepreneurs everywhere have cash management issues.  This is where Kiva can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for BioGro New Zealand Ltd. We are an organic certification company.  Organic certification gives many farmers a chance to get a higher price for their crops.  This leads to them putting more money into their community.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I really loved the story of Grameen and the idea of microlending.

lenders.name: M Smit
lenders.loan_because: It is a wonderful rewarding feeling to help someone in need
lenders.occupational_info: We sell properties and developments in South Africa, especially along the Garden Route in SA

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.occupational_info: I teach secondary students in Maths and Science.

lenders.name: Swiss Ladies
lenders.loan_because: We find Kiva a really interesting project. We are happy to help people to start up their own business.

lenders.name: Edgar
lenders.loan_because: Because I care about

lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer for an organization that builds homes for low income families.  Habitat for Humanity.  I also take college courses online.

lenders.loan_because: Microfinancing is a great idea, made even better by internet. Moreover, it serves as a kind of "paying back" for me: I never cease to learn and profit in many different ways from getting to know people while traveling in "poor" countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am teaching logics and theoretical computer science at a university of technology. I am traveling a lot, mainly in Asia, Europe and (Latin) America.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a farmer.  We grow corn, alfalfa, wheat and soybeans.  We also raise dairy heifers.

Well, some mornings I think it's the espresso ;) but in all honesty I know I'd much rather do my part to try and help in this world!

lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of software developers who provide ways for people to get more information and improve the process within which they work.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I am so grateful for all of the support and generosity that I've received in my life and want to offer some of that spirit back, particularly to other women working in agriculture and food businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small farm growing vegetables, raising dairy goats, and keeping laying chickens.  I also work with nonprofit organizations (NGOs) as a teacher and facilitator.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a businessman.  I advise the management of large organisations.  I help them improve their performance or their profitability.

lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone needs a little help from time to time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a exhibit marketing company that improves the way other companies market their products to possible buyers at various events. My role is to make sure that everything goes well at the event, and that we stick to a pre-determined budget.  I basically do what a wedding planner does, but, instead of planning weddings,  I work on events that show-off cars, software, and gadgets for the purpose of encouraging possible customers to purchase the products on display,

In this way, I also wish to demonstrate that the sometimes undemocratic actions and policies of the US Government do not always represent the sentiments of it's citizens.

lenders.loan_because: We were put on this earth to help and serve one another.  I only wish I could contribute  more.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a school library for special education, Deaf and Blind students. We check-out adaptive equipment  such as braille and large print books. braille paper, switch's, braille note takers.

lenders.name: Kawan

lenders.loan_because:
I want to be rich!!!!

What?!?! I won't be rich on Kiva ?!?! Crap...

lenders.loan_because: It helps others and to learn about others.

lenders.name: Xan
lenders.loan_because: My friend Andrew gave a donation gift to get me started.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm still mostly learning.

lenders.name: Search4CareerColleges
lenders.loan_because: The Search4CareerColleges.com team has a similar philosophy as Kiva, we help people change their direction in life through opportunities to start a new career path. It’s a perfect match for us to get involved with. We desire to see more businesses lending on this site.
lenders.occupational_info: Our Search4CareerColleges.com site helps people look for technical schools and find the right career training program for them.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Kindergarten.

lenders.name: Robbin
lenders.loan_because:
It's the best way to pay it forward.
We are all in this together!
lenders.occupational_info: I raise Alpacas for their warm fiber. They are a renewable source, humane and earth friendly! They also are so much fun to love and hug!

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because:
I too come from a country that is considered to be 3rd world. I began my company in a country other than where I am from. I too know the difficulties of being an Entrepreneur; with no one believing in my abilities as an entrepreneur.

I hope with a loan; I am able to contribute to someone's dream of becoming an Entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Event Planner. I currently work freelance, but aim on developing events for my company.

lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I was born into a good family and a comfortable life in an affluent society. I am well educated, in good health and have choices in my life. I recognize this good fortune and I want to be able to share it with others who have not been so fortunate, but who are working to change their situations and create better lives for themselves, their families and children.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves helping other people to find within themselves the power to change. Life coaching is a professional service in which coaches work with individuals (or groups) who desire a change in their lives but who may feel stuck in a current situation or way of being. Coaches believe that individuals have their own inner resources to solve their problems or attain their goals. So my job is to be a partner with the client, providing him or her with a different perspective and some techniques and action plans that help the client to find the solution within, take steps forward, and reach his or her goals.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to build themselves the life they wish to lead.  Not everyone has been given the opportunity to do so and through this website and others like it people are able to create more productive and healthier lives for them and their families.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: $25 to someone in need is better than buying beer or video games.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell coffee, make custom drinks, and try my best to make each customer's day a little brighter.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an educator. Knowledge is power, and I want to make sure everyone can access that power. I also want to travel.

lenders.name: meredith
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. I often give to charities, but never see what happens to the money I give.  For once I would like to see my money at work, and when it's done...be able to have someone else benefit from the same money.  I want to make a "gift that keeps on giving."  People not only make a living, but also build confidence, pride, and respect for themselves as they earn their own money!!  I want to be part of that. I also want to return a small part of what God has blessed me with to others!!  I don't have alot of money, but I have been blessed enough to help make a difference...that's what I want to do!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a self employed accountant.  I do work out of my home out of a small office.  I also raise livestock...pygmy goats and horses...for fun, but also a little income. I am very involved in the life of my young son.  So, I try to work many different small jobs so that I can be a mother whenever he needs me. I am also a college instructor that teaches accounting on a contract basis at a college.  I work nights, so I can be home with my son when he comes home from school.  When he's grown, I hope to have just one full-time job as an instructor at the local college. I hope then I can help more people in areas like this because I'll have more of the financial ability to do so!!!

lenders.name: Hayley
lenders.loan_because: We loan as the PaixQuebecPeace conference to thank our speakers and panelists for contributing their time to our project.
lenders.occupational_info: Exposing people from different backgrounds, with different opinions, and different experiences to one another to explore how we can better live together.  The forum is a daylong, bilingual peace-education conference in Montreal.

lenders.name: Natalie Portmans head
lenders.loan_because: It creates opportunities to get a Head.
lenders.occupational_info: Natural

lenders.name: CCLA
lenders.loan_because: Teaching the kids the importance of giving and how you can change the world.

lenders.name: Bill & Donna
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to fufill thier dreams. By helping others, we help ourselves.

lenders.name: ClarkUSEClass
lenders.loan_because: This account was setup for Clark University's Social Entrepreneurship Class in 2008. We'd like to thank our professor for encouraging us to get involved with this site.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students. Our work is reading and writing. Then we graduate and enter the real world.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I am saving for my retirement, but hate the idea of all that money sitting in the bank for the next 50+ years. So I am investing it in Kiva, so that while I wait I can help the world, like Jesus would
lenders.occupational_info: I don't have a real job yet :) This money is all from babysitting or gifts.

lenders.name: Johan
lenders.loan_because: Don't mind giving money. Looks like this might work over time.

lenders.name: Ellie
lenders.loan_because: There is a difference between wants and needs.  All my life, my needs have been fulfilled with ease, as have many of my wants.  While living in Costa Rica, I saw people struggling every day just to meet very basic needs and I was overcome with a sense of guilt and gratitude.  As a child, I learned that "to whom much has been given, much will be expected."  As an adult, this means to me that if I have the ability to help others, then to do so is a moral obligation.  Not a choice.

lenders.name: Eve
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is one area I can help impact the world I live in and help make it a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that schools have the technology they need to teach students effectively
